methods.name: removeAtIndex
methods.description: Remove file located at specific index in the model
methods.description_zh: 删除位于模型中特定索引处的文件

methods.name: removeFile
methods.description: Remove specified file from the model
methods.description_zh: 从模型中删除指定文件

methods.name: getNativeElement
methods.description: DEPRECATED; Access 'nativeEl' directly; Gets the native input DOM Element
methods.description_zh: 荒废的;直接访问 'nativeEl';获取本机输入 DOM 元素

methods.name: pickFiles
methods.description: Trigger file pick; Must be called as a direct consequence of user interaction (eg. in a click handler), due to browsers security policy
methods.description_zh: 触发文件拾取;由于浏览器安全策略，必须作为用户交互的直接结果调用（例如，在点击处理程序中）

events.name: focus
events.description_zh: 当组件获得焦点时发出

events.name: blur
events.description_zh: 当组件失去焦点时发出

events.name: clear
events.description: When using the 'clearable' property, this event is emitted when the clear icon is clicked
events.description_zh: 当使用 'clearable' 属性时，当单击 clear 图标时，将触发此事件

events.name: rejected
events.description: Emitted after files are picked and some do not pass the validation props (accept, max-file-size, max-total-size, filter, etc)
events.description_zh: 在选择文件后发出，并且有些文件未通过验证 props（accept、max-file-size、max-total-size、filter 等）

v-model.description: Model of the component; Must be FileList or Array if using 'multiple' prop; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive
v-model.description_zh: 组件的模型;如果使用 'multiple' 属性，则必须为 FileList 或 Array;使用此属性（以及 'update：modelValue' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令
v-model.desc: Model of the component; Must be FileList or Array if using 'multiple' prop; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

append.description: Append file(s) to current model rather than replacing them; Has effect only when using 'multiple' mode
append.description_zh: 将文件附加到当前模型，而不是替换它们;仅在使用 'multiple' 模式时有效

display-value.description: Override default selection string, if not using 'file' or 'selected' scoped slots and if not using 'use-chips' prop
display-value.description_zh: 如果不使用 'file' 或 'selected' 作用域的插槽，如果不使用 'use-chips' 属性，则覆盖默认选择字符串

use-chips.description: Use QChip to show picked files
use-chips.description_zh: 使用 QChip 显示选取的文件

counter-label.description: Label for the counter; The 'counter' prop is necessary to enable this one
counter-label.description_zh: 计数器的标签;'counter' prop 是启用这个 prop 所必需的

input-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the underlying selection container
input-class.description_zh: 要归属于底层选择容器的类定义

input-style.description: Style definitions to be attributed to the underlying selection container
input-style.description_zh: 要归属于基础选择容器的样式定义

name.description: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL
name.description_zh: 用于指定控件的名称;如果处理直接提交到 URL 的表单，则很有用

label.description: A text label that will “float” up above the input field, once the field gets focus
label.description_zh: 一个文本标签，一旦字段获得焦点，该标签将“浮动”在输入字段上方

stack-label.description: Label will be always shown above the field regardless of field content (if any)
stack-label.description_zh: 无论字段内容如何（如果有），标签将始终显示在字段上方

hint.description: Helper (hint) text which gets placed below your wrapped form component
hint.description_zh: Helper （hint） 文本，该文本放置在包装的表单组件下方

hide-hint.description: Hide the helper (hint) text when field doesn't have focus
hide-hint.description_zh: 当字段没有焦点时隐藏帮助程序（提示）文本

label-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
label-color.desc: Color name for the label from the Quasar Color Palette; Overrides the 'color' prop; The difference from 'color' prop is that the label will always have this color, even when field is not focused
label-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for the label from the Quasar Color Palette; Overrides the 'color' prop; The difference from 'color' prop is that the label will always have this color, even when field is not focused
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

bg-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
bg-color.desc: Color name for the label from the Quasar Color Palette; Overrides the 'color' prop; The difference from 'color' prop is that the label will always have this color, even when field is not focused
bg-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

loading.description: Signals the user a process is in progress by displaying a spinner; Spinner can be customized by using the 'loading' slot.
loading.description_zh: 通过显示微调器向用户发出进程正在进行的信号;Spinner 可以通过使用 'loading' 插槽进行自定义。

clearable.description: Appends clearable icon when a value (not undefined or null) is set; When clicked, model becomes null
clearable.description_zh: 在设置值（非 undefined 或 null）时附加可清除图标;单击后，model 变为 null

clear-icon.description: Custom icon to use for the clear button when using along with 'clearable' prop
clear-icon.description_zh: 与 'clearable' prop 一起使用时用于 clear 按钮的自定义图标

borderless.description_zh: 对字段使用“无边界”设计

standout.description: Use 'standout' design for the field; Specifies classes to be applied when focused (overriding default ones)
standout.description_zh: 为该领域使用“突出”设计;指定在聚焦时要应用的类（覆盖默认类）

label-slot.description: Enables label slot; You need to set it to force use of the 'label' slot if the 'label' prop is not set
label-slot.description_zh: 启用标签插槽;如果未设置 'label' 属性，您需要将其设置为强制使用 'label' 插槽

hide-bottom-space.description: Do not reserve space for hint/error/counter anymore when these are not used; As a result, it also disables the animation for those; It also allows the hint/error area to stretch vertically based on its content
hide-bottom-space.description_zh: 当这些不使用时，不要再为 hint/error/counter 保留空间;因此，它还会禁用这些对象的动画;它还允许提示/错误区域根据其内容垂直拉伸

counter.description: Show an automatic counter on bottom right
counter.description_zh: 在右下角显示自动计数器

square.description: Remove border-radius so borders are squared; Overrides 'rounded' prop
square.description_zh: 删除 border-radius，以便边界是方形的;覆盖 'rounded' prop

item-aligned.description: Match inner content alignment to that of QItem
item-aligned.description_zh: 将内部内容对齐与 QItem 的对齐方式

autofocus.description: Focus field on initial component render
autofocus.description_zh: 初始组件渲染上的焦点字段

for.description: Used to specify the 'id' of the control and also the 'for' attribute of the label that wraps it; If no 'name' prop is specified, then it is used for this attribute as well
for.description_zh: 用于指定控件的 'id' 以及包装它的标签的 'for' 属性;如果未指定 'name' prop，则它也用于此属性

accept.description: Comma separated list of unique file type specifiers. Maps to 'accept' attribute of native input type=file element
accept.description_zh: 以逗号分隔的唯一文件类型说明符列表。映射到本机输入 type=file 元素的 'accept' 属性

capture.description: Optionally, specify that a new file should be captured, and which device should be used to capture that new media of a type defined by the 'accept' prop. Maps to 'capture' attribute of native input type=file element
capture.description_zh: （可选）指定应捕获新文件，以及应使用哪个设备来捕获由 'accept' 属性定义的类型的新媒体。映射到本机输入 type=file 元素的 'capture' 属性

max-file-size.description: Maximum size of individual file in bytes
max-file-size.description_zh: 单个文件的最大大小（以字节为单位）

max-total-size.description: Maximum size of all files combined in bytes
max-total-size.description_zh: 所有文件的最大大小（以字节为单位）

max-files.description: Maximum number of files to contain

filter.description: Custom filter for added files; Only files that pass this filter will be added to the queue and uploaded; For best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline
filter.description_zh: 添加文件的自定义过滤器;只有通过此筛选条件的文件才会被添加到队列中并上传;为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围中引用它，不要内联定义它

slots.name: file
slots.description: Override default node to render a file from the user picked list
slots.description_zh: 覆盖默认节点以渲染用户选取列表中的文件

slots.name: selected
slots.description: Override default selection slot; Suggestion: QChip

slots.name: prepend
slots.description: Prepend inner field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn
slots.description_zh: 预置 inner field;建议： QIcon， QBtn

slots.name: append
slots.description: Append to inner field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn
slots.description_zh: 附加到内部字段;建议： QIcon， QBtn

slots.name: before
slots.description: Prepend outer field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn
slots.description_zh: 预置 outer field;建议： QIcon， QBtn

slots.name: after
slots.description: Append outer field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn
slots.description_zh: 附加外部字段;建议： QIcon， QBtn

slots.name: label
slots.description: Slot for label; Used only if 'label-slot' prop is set or the 'label' prop is set; When it is used the text in the 'label' prop is ignored
slots.description_zh: 标签槽;仅在设置了 'label-slot' prop 或设置了 'label' prop 时使用;当使用它时，'label' prop 中的文本将被忽略

slots.name: error
slots.description: Slot for errors; Enabled only if 'bottom-slots' prop is used; Suggestion: <div>
slots.description_zh: 错误槽;仅在使用 'bottom-slots' prop 时启用;建议： <div>

slots.name: hint
slots.description: Slot for hint text; Enabled only if 'bottom-slots' prop is used; Suggestion: <div>
slots.description_zh: 提示文本的插槽;仅在使用 'bottom-slots' prop 时启用;建议： <div>

slots.name: counter
slots.description: Slot for counter text; Enabled only if 'bottom-slots' prop is used; Suggestion: <div>
slots.description_zh: 计数器文本的插槽;仅在使用 'bottom-slots' prop 时启用;建议： <div>

slots.name: loading
slots.description: Override default spinner when component is in loading mode; Use in conjunction with 'loading' prop
slots.description_zh: 当组件处于加载模式时覆盖默认微调器;与 'loading' prop 结合使用
